code: import _objectSpread from"D:/projects/e-store-redux-mern/frontend/node_modules/@babel/runtime/helpers/esm/objectSpread2.js";import{CART_ADD_ITEM,CART_ADD_ITEM_FAIL,CART_EMPTY,CART_REMOVE_ITEM,CART_SAVE_PAYMENT_METHOD,CART_SAVE_SHIPPING_ADDRESS}from'../constants/cartConstants';export const cartReducer=function(){let state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{cartItems:[]};let action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case CART_ADD_ITEM:const item=action.payload;const existItem=state.cartItems.find(x=>x.product===item.product);if(existItem){return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{error:'',cartItems:state.cartItems.map(x=>x.product===existItem.product?item:x)});}else{return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{error:'',cartItems:[...state.cartItems,item]});}case CART_REMOVE_ITEM:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{error:'',cartItems:state.cartItems.filter(x=>x.product!==action.payload)});case CART_SAVE_SHIPPING_ADDRESS:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{shippingAddress:action.payload});case CART_SAVE_PAYMENT_METHOD:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{paymentMethod:action.payload});case CART_ADD_ITEM_FAIL:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{error:action.payload});case CART_EMPTY:return _objectSpread(_objectSpread({},state),{},{error:'',cartItems:[]});default:return state;}};
